resources.string: Please enter your access code below and press submit to continue.
ITsforHer and all of us involved would love to hear about your thoughts and opinions about women in STEM(Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics) fields.
This short survey consists of 10 multiple choice questions and will take no longer than 5 minutes to complete.
Please press start when you are ready to continue.
Which of the following best describes your highest level of completed education?
Do you currently work or study in a STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math) field
Are you working towards entering or moving further in a STEM field?
Do you believe women can have a successful career as well as manage all household affairs, including childcare and housework?
Do you believe there should be specialised projects/programs for only women, in STEM fields?
Do you believe the ‘Glass Ceiling’ still exists in industries today?
From your own experience, when, out of the following, do you think the number of women was at its highest in STEM fields?
Which of the following statements do you think best describes the low number of women in STEM fields?
Women are pushed towards non-practical subjects throughout life.
The attitude of men towards women in these fields.
STEM subjects are not taught thoroughly at school so no interest in shown later in life.
Advertisement for technology (past and present) is mainly focused at men.
Thank-you for your time and responses.
Your answers have been submitted and you may now close the application.
